name: A History of War (v 0.1)
description:
Overview

This is an ongoing project that I'm developing. It's going to be a cellular automaton based simulation, inspired by a YouTube video, but much expanded. There's no real goal to it, the only goal is to watch the world developing and maybe meddle in it to shape it into the world you want.

Controls

Space --- pause/resume gameplay

Number keys ---- select an empire (0-9) that can be placed

Left/Right arrows --- can also be used to select an empire to place

Mouse wheel --- select strength (1-100) of cell that can be placed

Left mouse --- place one unit of the currently selected empire with the selected cell at the pointer position

More Info

The numbers at the bottom show the ID of each active empire (in brackets) and their average strength
